sentences.sContent: Then we found a study that showed there was a material that seemed to have stimulated eyelash growth.
sentences.sContent_eng: Then we found a study that showed there was a material that seemed to have stimulated eyelash growth.
sentences.sCn: 随后我们找到了一项研究，研究表明的确有一种物质可以刺激睫毛增长。

sentences.sContent: Longtime readers of the Beauty Brains are familiar with all that we have written about eyelash growth products.
sentences.sContent_eng: Longtime readers of the Beauty Brains are familiar with all that we have written about eyelash growth products.
sentences.sCn: 美丽头脑的老读者都已经非常熟悉我们所写的，有关于睫毛增长产品的文章了。

trans.tranOther: one of the small hairs that grow along the edge of your eyelids
